EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Pricing_Bid_Log__c.OwnerFullName}!!
Your bid log entry {!Pricing_Bid_Log__c.Name} & {!Pricing_Bid_Log__c.Link} still requires your input to complete the Win/Loss and Competitive Information.
Please reach out to your respective sales partner, discuss the deal status and then complete the required bid log information.
Thanks!!
